First of seven haftarot of consolation

Fifth of seven haftarot of consolation

Seventh and final of consolation haftarot
Shabbat Shuva - between Rosh Hashana and Yom Kippur
When Vayeilech is separate, read #53 (Shuva Yisrael) instead
